thought: To craft gray_concrete_powder, I need to craft gray_dye first. The recipe for gray_dye requires 1 black_dye and 1 white_dye. I have both black_dye and white_dye in my inventory, so I will first move the white_dye from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
